name: Immunity
description:
Immunity is a fast-paced arcade shooter with endless waves of relentless enemies. Play as the last surviving white blood-cell and destroy opposing threats that wish only to vanquish you. With an endless hoard of bacteria swarming toward you, your only choice is to defend yourself. With the help of abilities like toxicity, tracer, and energy shield, blast through these relentless enemies until you can't fight anymore. Use the gold you receive after a round to purchase more power-ups to aid you in your next round.

What's New:
  • In-Game Store - Purchase Toxicity, Rocket, Tracer, Energy Shield, or Super-shot power-ups to gain an edge on your foes!
  • Infected Areas Browse Screen - Purge the existing diseases you find in common areas like the brain, heart, and stomach. This displays the currently active diseases and currently eradicated diseases in the corresponding areas.
  • Additional Enemies - Fight against symbiotic and viral entities who are more faster and stronger than their lesser entities.

Currently known bugs
Be sure and check ongoing patch notes for PC beta updates going forward. Listed below are all known issues for this version of the game as of November 12, 2019:

  • Selecting a body part in the Infected Areas Screen does not spawn disease bosses.
  • The Steam Immunity GamerCard does not load users Steam avatar sometimes. Bug is resolved when entering a game then returning to menu.
  • There are no store options for other power-ups currently.
